DOC.brief_summary: RATIONALE : The amount fat , fiber , soy , fruit , vegetable , vitamin E , green tea diet may affect androgen metabolism men . This may affect PSA level patient prostate cancer . PURPOSE : Randomized phase III trial compare effectiveness two diet , differ fat , fiber , soy , fruit , vegetable , vitamin E , green tea content , affect PSA level patient prostate cancer .
DOC.brief_title: Diet PSA Levels Patients With Prostate Cancer
DOC.detailed_description: OBJECTIVES : I . Determine effect 2 dietary regimen level prostate-specific antigen ( PSA ) patient prostate cancer . II . Determine compliance patient dietary regimen . III . Evaluate effect dietary regimen quality life patient . IV . Evaluate effect dietary regimen PSA anxiety patient . V. Evaluate effect dietary regimen obesity , high blood pressure , serum cholesterol patient . OUTLINE : This randomize study . Patients stratify accord previous treatment ( prostatectomy v radiotherapy ) prostate-specific antigen ( PSA ) level ( le 5 mg/mL v 5 great mg/mL ) . All patient complete quality life , dietary , questionnaire , , conclusion study . Patients randomize one two dietary intervention regimen : Arm I ( Intensive Nutritional Intervention ) : Patients assign follow low fat , high fiber diet also high soy , fruit vegetable , green tea , vitamin E. Patients meet nutritionist nutrition education dietary counsel weekly 8 week , every 2 week 2 month , monthly 14 month . Sessions include dietary counseling , meal planning , instruction skill necessary maintain dietary lifestyle change . Patients record dietary intake regular basis . Arm II ( General Nutritional Instruction ) : Patients assign follow dietary guideline establish National Cancer Institute . Patients meet nutritionist dietary counseling monitoring every 2 month 18 month . Patients arm PSA level test study , 1 3 month study , every 3 month thereafter 18 month . PROJECTED ACCRUAL : A total 154 patient accrue study 2 year .
DOC.criteria: DISEASE CHARACTERISTICS : Histologically confirm adenocarcinoma prostate either : Two increase prostatespecific antigen ( PSA ) level minimal 30 % increase range value follow either prostate surgery ( prostatectomy ) radiation therapy PATIENT CHARACTERISTICS : Age : 18 Performance status : Karnofsky 70100 % Life expectancy : At least 6 month Hematopoietic : WBC great 3,500/mm3 Platelet count great 100,000/mm3 Hepatic : Bilirubin le 2.0 mg/dL OR SGOT le 3 time upper limit normal ( ULN ) Renal : Creatinine le 2.0 mg/dL OR Creatinine clearance great 40 mL/min Cardiovascular : No significant heart disease ( New York Heart Association class III IV ) Pulmonary : No severe debilitate pulmonary disease Other : No narcotic dependent pain No extreme dietary pattern ( macrobiotic diet ) No baseline diet few 25 % calorie fat No history second malignancy within past 5 year except nonmelanomatous skin cancer No insulindependent diabetes No infection require antibiotic PRIOR CONCURRENT THERAPY : Biologic therapy : Not specify Chemotherapy : Not specify Endocrine therapy : At least 4 week since hormone therapy Radiotherapy : At least 4 week since radiotherapy Surgery : Prior prostatectomy allow Other : Recovered toxic effect prior therapy
